description:
Ao is going to the summer festival with her Frame Arm Girls! With Jinrai’s antics and the Materia sisters’ troublemaking humor, Ao is in for a ride.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fireworks Festival of Feelings / Let`s Go to School 2
Kanjite Hanabi Taikai / Gakkou ni Ikou 2
感じて花火大会 / 学校に行こう2
